txt.en: 'So you are not happy with your Yule pony? Well, I can offer you an exchange, as I would not want one of my ponies where it was not desired. However, this is not a decision to be taken lightly, so I will give you a moment to think about this.\n\n'If you are really sure you want to exchange your pony, speak to me again, and I will give you a receipt in return. You can then exchange the receipt for a different pony.'

'So you have decided you want to exchange your Yule pony after all? So be it. Look over this receipt and tell me if it looks fine to you.\n\n'And this time, I hope you are more sure of your choice. Choosing a pony should not be something done lightly!'
Cam Applewood has told you that you can exchange your Yule pony for another.
Give your Yule pony to Cam

Cam Applewood is at the Hengstacer Farm, north of the Bree Festival Grounds.\n\nCam suggested that you take a moment to consider whether or not you want to exchange your pony. If you decided that you do want to exchange your pony, you should speak to Cam again.
